name: This is my story
description:
Is afterlife in which beautiful girls have been living for a long time a paradise?
Then why are you the first guy is surrounded by them?
Or you are not the first, and this world isn't so paradisal?
Or maybe the girls have some secrets, the solution of which would entail a chain of events, once in which, you will not be able to go back.
And do you really need to come back?

This is a story about hero who finds himself in an unfamiliar world that lives by its own laws. Here you can not die, even if you want, but you can just disappear.
There are people around you, who walk here and there, but they don't exist in fact. There is always an exciting story, which can be told to you.
The most interesting thing is that here of this story... It is you. This is your story.

Game features:
- Dialog system provides choices, which affect plot of the story.
- You dont have a character choice, you are creating your own story for your character.
- 7 different endings, which can lead you to a piquant finale with one of the girls ... or not with just one.
- Our game contains more than 100 000 words which allows you to immerse into the miraculous tale.
